channel.title: facebook on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in facebook on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-21
item.description: Facebook is planning to rebrand the company with a new name (3 minute read) Facebook is planning to change its company name next week.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-18
item.description: Facebook is researching AI systems that see, hear, and remember everything you do (5 minute read) Ego4D is a research project at Facebook that is using first-person video data to train AI to develop skills such as episodic memory, forecasting, and audio-visual diarization.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-08
item.description: Paddle Plans to Launch Alternative In-App Purchase System on iOS That Circumvents Apple’s Fees (2 minute read) Paddle has announced a new payment system as an alternative to Apple’s in-app purchase mechanism.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-05
item.description: Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, and Oculus are down. Here’s what we know (2 minute read) Facebook and all of its services went down today.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-23
item.description: Facebook names a new CTO with a major focus on hardware (2 minute read) Facebook has promoted Andrew Bosworth, the current head of its hardware division, to the role of chief technology officer.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-20
item.description: OnlyFans bans sexually explicit content to appease banks and payment services (3 minute read) OnlyFans will ban sexually explicit material on its platform from October 1 to comply with the requests of its banking partners and payout providers.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-10
item.description: Netflix is working on a bunch of new reality shows, and you’re invited (2 minute read) Netflix has opened up casting for future programming to anyone over the age of 18 in the US, Canada, United Kingdom, and Ireland.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-04
item.description: Facebook will host a paid movie premiere this month (2 minute read) Facebook will host the premiere of The Outsider, a documentary about the National 9/11 Memorial and Museum in New York City.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-14
item.description: Apple developing new ‘Apple Pay Later’ service to let customers buy any Apple Pay purchases in monthly installments (2 minute read) Apple is working on a new service called Apple Pay Later that will allow users to buy products and pay them off in monthly installments.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-10
item.description: Facebook plans first smartwatch for next summer with two cameras, heart rate monitor (3 minute read) Facebook’s smartwatch will feature two cameras on a detachable display.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-06
item.description: Facebook takes on Nextdoor with Neighborhoods tool (3 minute read) Facebook is rolling out a new feature called Neighborhoods in four US cities and Canada.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-15
item.description: Exclusive: Here’s a first look at some more upcoming features in Android 12 (12 minute read) The first Android 12 developer preview was released nearly two months ago.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-05
item.description: Personal data of 533 million Facebook users leaks online (3 minute read) Personal data from 533 million Facebook accounts was recently leaked online.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-15
item.description: Facebook Working on Smart Watch to Compete With Apple Watch (2 minute read) Facebook is working on a smart watch that will work without a tethered smartphone.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-11
item.description: Facebook is reportedly working on a Clubhouse copy (1 minute read) Facebook is in the early stages of developing a Clubhouse clone.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-10
item.description: Shopify’s payment option to be added to Facebook, Instagram (1 minute read) Shopify is expanding its Shop Pay payment option to all users selling on Facebook and Instagram.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-04
item.description: Myanmar internet providers block Facebook services after government order (2 minute read) Internet providers in Myanmar blocked access to Facebook and its related services after military leaders seized power in a coup.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-29
item.description: Robinhood, Interactive Brokers restrict trading in GameStop stock and options (7 minute read) Robinhood took steps to restrict the trading in GameStop stock and other related securities.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-18
item.description: Amazon Fresh grocery store in Los Angeles opens to the public (1 minute read) Amazon Fresh at Woodland Hills, Los Angeles is now open to the public from 7 AM to 10 PM PT daily.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-17
item.description: Facebook’s Infinite Office is a virtual office space for the WFH crowd (1 minute read) Facebook Connect is introducing a new virtual office experience called Infinite Office.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-15
item.description: Facebook leak reveals Oculus Quest 2 as a 4K standalone VR headset (2 minute read) Facebook is expected to unveil the Oculus Quest 2 at the Facebook Connect conference later this week.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-11
item.description: Inside TikTok’s killer algorithm (5 minute read) TikTok has revealed how its algorithm works.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-18
item.description: Apple Threatens to Terminate Epic Games’ Developer Accounts on August 28 (3 minute read) Apple plans to terminate Epic Games’ access to its App Store and app development tools by August 28.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-15
item.description: Amazon’s new smart shopping cart lets you check out without a cashier (4 minute read) Amazon has a new smart grocery store cart that is equipped with a touchscreen and other hardware to automatically detect what items are being placed inside it.
